short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the SLO Counter to Invicti Zendesk Tickets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon will show additional customized operational information that Zendesk is not able to provide. And the scope of this add-on is limited to the Invicti domain of Zendesk. This is for boosting support agent's productivity and efficiency.
